transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ye aap ye Prince sir baat kar rahe hain, Jiyaar pollution se?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Prince sir bataiye aapka call aaya tha, kya issue hai?
Customer: Haan ji, wo maine aapko bataya tha na wo IndiaMART ka aapne bataya tha na ke refund karwana hai.
Executive: Achcha wo aapka account band ho raha hai?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai, main yaha pe refund request dal rahi hu. Ek minute call pe rahiyega. Request to aapne teen char baar dal diya hai.
Executive: Ek aur baar dal dijiye, wait kariye. Fir to koi fayda hi nahi hai, maine aapko char baar aapne bol diya ke request dal diya hai.
Executive: Are tension mat lijiye, aapka refund mil jayega ab aapko. Ek minute call pe rahiye, aapne ticket pe call kiya hai na, don't worry.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: He called me. He want refund as business. He want refund as business.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Dekho abhi maine na aapki calling ki ticket close ki hai, ek aur ticket on kar off wo kar rahi hu. Wait kariyega.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai, ek minute, ek minute mein call back kar rahi hu, sir phone zarur uthana.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive assured refund and created a ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in one minute.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, ticket
